body_html:
I have tested on all versions of bazel supported by the master branch now (0.2.0, 0.2.1, 0.2.2, 0.2.3, 0.3.0, 0.3.1) and I got the same error every time. I carefully cleaned cache and killed any lingering bazel process between builds.

I also double-checked that building without GPU support is indeed fine, contrary to @flybirdx101's experience.

I also double-checked that building without GPU support is indeed fine, contrary to @flybirdx101's experience.
body:
I have tested on all versions of bazel supported by the master branch now (0.2.0, 0.2.1, 0.2.2, 0.2.3, 0.3.0, 0.3.1) and I got the same error every time. I carefully cleaned cache and killed any lingering bazel process between builds.

I also double-checked that building without GPU support is indeed fine, contrary to @flybirdx101's experience.
